pages.text: Note to Self: Write a section about special ingredients which give magical effects when I have time. -Hael

pages.title: Hardtack Dough
pages.text: Simple and quick to cook even at a campfire if you don't have water or a proper stove to spare.

pages.title: Hardtack
pages.text: Tastes like a dry Brick of Salt and Flour, but it's filling.

pages.title: Flour
pages.text: Used for creating Bread, Pastries, and more, this is borderline universal in cooking.

pages.title: Oil Bottle
pages.text: Used often in Stir Fries and other dishes.

pages.title: Milk Bottle
pages.text: Used to make Cheese, Butter, Pastries, and more.

pages.title: Butter
pages.text: Useful for baking, occasionally as an Oil alternative, too.

pages.title: Vegetable Broth
pages.text: Tastes good alone, but useful for soups.

pages.title: Bone Broth
pages.text: For a more savory taste than Vegetable Broth.

pages.title: Beef Stew
pages.text: Far more filling than a plain slab of Steak and a Baked Potato.

pages.title: Pumpkin Soup
pages.text: Lanjya's specialty. I always tend to burn it somehow. It's a curse.

pages.title: Bread Dough
pages.text: Standard Bread Dough.

pages.title: Bread
pages.text: Cooks quickly, too.

pages.title: Toast
pages.text: Doesn't taste great on it's own, but it makes for great sandwiches.

pages.title: Mutton Sandwich
pages.text: I prefer Fish Sandwiches or Eggs on Toast, personally. -Lanjya

pages.title: Mushroom Stew
pages.text: Be sure to use Brown Mushrooms to neutralize the other ones!

pages.title: Sweet Berry Pie Dough
pages.text: Tastes better raw than cooked in my opinion, but I dislike pie's texture.

pages.title: Sweet Berry Pie
pages.text: Smells lovely when baking.

pages.title: Sweet Berry Pie Slice
pages.text: I guess you could eat it all at once, but I'd rather not make myself feel sick.

pages.title: Vanilla Frosting
pages.text: Makes for great cakes and cookies.

pages.title: Chocolate
pages.text: Honestly, I could eat an entire Crate of this on its own in one sitting.

pages.title: Cake Dough
pages.text: Tastes wonderful, I prefer Chocolate Cake personally though.

pages.title: Cake
pages.text: I'm starting to crave cake while writing this book now.

pages.title: Fried Egg
pages.text: Tastes wonderful.

pages.title: Kelp Salad
pages.text: Not a favorite of mine, but it's filling.

pages.title: Baked Seeds
pages.text: Fruits, Vegetables, and Seeds can always be cooked on their own.

pages.title: Carrot Juice
pages.text: Some make for good juices, as well.

pages.title: Cod Gefilte
pages.text: A personal favorite of mine, but it's certainly an acquired taste. -Hael

pages.title: Dog Biscuit
pages.text: Perfect for your little furry friends.

pages.title: Brine-Cured Flesh
pages.text: Makes for good Dog or Wolf food, I don't recommend eating it yourself, however.
